pkgmetadata.longdescription: Data.gov.in API Wrapper // This wrapper allows the user to communicate with more than 80,000 API posted on data.gov.in - open data platform of the government of India https:data.gov.in/ogpl_apis. It also allows the user to search for the API required through the universe of the API with a better interface than the one the official website provides. Once a user has the ID by using the API discovery functionalities, it allows one to converse with the API using a consistent format across all available API.
